divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my back window when I saw something. I could'nt believe my own two eyes it was beautiful as can be. It had like a snowflake appearance it was like a glowing white orb.It had to of been about the size of 2 or 3 vw bugs.Ive lived around airports my whole life sky harber L.A.F.B also Deervalley airport I know when I see a plane this was not falling it was at a low alt. moving as if the pilot was pushing and letting of the gas peddel at speeds up to 2 -300 mph. here's what really got my attention a min or less after I saw a black or dark gry millatary helocopter I believed to be in persute of the object because it was following in the exact flight path of the ufo. also it was traveling eastbound between glendale and bethanyhome rd. around 43rd ave. IF anyone else saw the same thing please leave a post .
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around May 11th 2012
Summary: white gowing orb clearly not of anything we have possably transparet in nature.fast moving .awesome
